title: When is the next IP weekend for OCE?
body:
As the title says. 

I understand we got an IP week with the Ocean week but just wondering when i should clear my scheduled to play a ton of LoL.

replies.body: Probably sometime in april. It will also most likely be a "the more premade you are, the more IP you get" kind of thing.
OOO i hope so. I played so many games with new people and my own list when they did that last. Was very nice.

Used to be a ip weekend back in early s4.

Then it went away.
